import dec

source:
time_vector = pd.date_range(start='1/1/2016', end='01/01/2017', freq='H')
newdf = pd.DataFrame(index=time_vector, columns=meteo.columns)
newdf.drop(newdf.tail(1).index,inplace=True) # drop last 1 rows
newdf

import time
from datetime import timedelta

df0 = newdf.copy()
mask = newdf.isna()
missing_values_time = df0["Temperature_C"][mask["Temperature_C"]].index

while df0["Temperature_C"].isna().any():
    try:
        df0.loc[missing_values_time] = df0.loc[missing_values_time - timedelta(days=1)].values
    except:
        df0.loc[missing_values_time] = -100000555555

df0

latitude = 37.97 # latitude  N
longitude = 23.92  # longitude E
elevation = 131.064  # meters above the sea

source:
ghi_tot=pd.read_csv('ghi_2016_tot.csv')
ghi_tot['G(i)']
#to avoid saving possible blank lines at the end
ghi_tot=ghi_tot[:8760].copy()
ghi_tot=ghi_tot.drop(columns=['H_sun', 'T2m','WS10m','Int'])
ghi_tot

#if leap year, run following code
start=datetime.datetime.strptime('2016-02-28 23:59:59', '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
end=datetime.datetime.strptime('2016-02-29 23:59:59', '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
df_365=df[(df.index<start) | (df.index>end)]
df=df_365.copy()
print(len(df))
